name: Ishfaq Ahmed
title: Ishfaq Ahmed - Portfolio
copyright: © 2024 Ishfaq Ahmed. Built with React, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS.
summary: Full Stack Software Developer experienced in frontend (React, React Native, Next Js) and backend (Node.js, PostgreSQL, REST APIs, GraphQL) development. Skilled in designing intuitive, user-focused interfaces and building scalable systems for critical applications.

experience.description: Contributed as a Frontend Developer on the Makman platform by designing and implementing responsive, user-friendly interfaces using React.js and SCSS. Utilized Redux for efficient state management to ensure seamless data flow across components. Collaborated closely with backend teams to integrate RESTful APIs, built modular and reusable components, optimized performance for faster rendering, and actively participated in Agile ceremonies including sprint planning, code reviews, and daily stand-ups.

Designed, developed, and maintained scalable backend services using Node.js with the NestJS framework. Built GraphQL APIs and optimized database performance using TypeORM with PostgreSQL. Integrated third-party services including payment, logistics, and notification APIs. Key contribution includes engineering a scalable RESTful API for the Hellogov parcel dispatch system using Easypost, resulting in a 30% improvement in operational efficiency. Implemented unit testing and CI/CD pipelines to ensure code quality and faster deployments.

Built scalable backend APIs using Node.js and Express.js alongside interactive frontend applications with React.js and Next.js. Implemented secure JWT-based authentication with role-based access control. Optimized database queries across MongoDB (Mongoose) and SQL databases to improve performance and scalability. Worked on multiple projects including Queue (music streaming integrations with TikTok, Spotify, Apple Music), Loyalist (fan engagement using Spotify, Twilio, and Stripe), and Thermalog (React-based analytics dashboard using Redux and MUI). Collaborated with cross-functional teams following Agile and Scrum practices.

details: Strong foundation in programming fundamentals and problem-solving
Focused on algorithms, logic building, and analytical thinking
Achieved high academic distinction with 92% marks
Courses: Data Structures, Java, C++, Web Development, Operating Systems, Computer Architecture, system design
Volunteer: Ambassador at SAMF & PSYWSC'19 Conferences

projects.title: FilterStack
projects.description: Browser-based photo editing app with layered filters and complete client-side privacy.

projects.title: QuickMeme
projects.description: A Chrome extension for creating memes from any image with customizable text overlay and styling options.

projects.title: BPPV - Eye Tracker
projects.description: Desktop solution for analyzing vertigo eye-tracking data in real time or offline with annotations.

projects.title: Curio - Research Assistant
projects.description: An intelligent research assistant that helps gather, analyze, and visualize data from multiple sources using advanced AI workflows. Built with LangChain and LangGraph, integrating Python-based data processing with a modern Next.js frontend for interactive research insights.

projects.title: Hellogov
projects.description: A platform focused on streamlining DMV, immigration, passport, and visa services in the USA. Users can submit required documents, while AI-powered models extract, validate, and process data seamlessly with government offices, improving operational efficiency.

projects.title: Thermalog
projects.description: A sensor monitoring and analytics dashboard providing real-time insights into environmental conditions. Supports threshold configuration, alerts, and remote sensor control to ensure optimal system performance.

projects.title: Makman
projects.description: A digital platform developed for Target Oilfield Services L.L.C, Oman, designed to manage and sell critical datasets related to wells, production plants, and research for improved operational efficiency and decision-making.

projects.title: Ontegra Alegra
projects.description: A customer-facing facility management application that enables users to book services, track cases, manage assets, and receive guided support through an integrated AI assistant named Alegra.

projects.title: Ontegra Techi
projects.description: An enterprise-grade facility management solution built to streamline daily operations, including task management, workforce tracking, asset monitoring, and inventory management with real-time visibility.
